cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1195, Workplace Violence Prevention for Health Care and Social Service Workers Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 33 (Monday, February 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COURTNEY:
H.R. 1195.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H549]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
